name: Typhlosion
flavorText:
If its rage peaks,
it becomes so hot
that anything that touches it will
instantly go
up in flames.

previous.name: Quilava
previous.flavorText:
Be careful if it
turns its back
during battle. It means that it will
attack with the
fire on its back.

next.name: Totodile
next.flavorText:
Its well-developed
jaws are powerful
and capable of crushing anything.
Even its trainer
must be careful.

pokemon.name: Cyndaquil
pokemon.flavorText:
It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on
its back burn more vigorously.
